thread.title: This Unicorn Glitter Beard at London's Fashion Week Will Make You Cry Rainbows
thread.title_full: This Unicorn Glitter Beard at London's Fashion Week Will Make You Cry Rainbows

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This Unicorn Glitter Beard at London's Fashion Week Will Make You Cry Rainbows
text:
I feel like I just ate a bunch of mushrooms and then went to a Cirque Du Soleil show, and I love it.
London-based designer Jack Irving showed at London Fashion Week yesterday and his show was off the chain. And I mean that in the best possible way — check out the glitter unicorn beard! And the reflective helmets! And all the tentacles! It's like a Lady Gaga fever dream came to life, ate a rainbow, and shit out this magical turd. (Which makes sense seeing as he's one of Lady Gaga's favorite designers. I mean, na doy.)
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below I love this a lot — it's as if the dinner party scene from Beetlejuic e came to life and humped unicorn. Praise.
Anyway! Check out the glorious insanity and get ready for our colorful future:
